name: G300 RTS Game
description:
This is the base for an RTS game completed as the final project for G300 at Indiana University (Production 1).  There is not much actual content in the game, but it is a good building point and shows off some pretty fun mechanics I made.

In the actual build of the game enemy spawning  doesn't seem to be functioning, but  it works in the unity editor so who knows.

If you would like to access the scripts in the project or play it in the editor to see how stuff works this is the repository for the game

https://bitbucket.org/jmchurch/final-project/src/master/
